title: Turun Kirjakahvila
description: Small vegan food cafe in the historical centre of Turku. Located in the inner yard so that it is a bit difficult to find. Live music and discussion events with topics ranging from literature, theatre, contemporary arts to politics and society. Has wireless internet access. Food is made on cafe premises. Soymilk available for coffee. Offers environmentally friendly beverages (beer, cider and lemonade). All food served is vegan. Student discount on coffee and tea. Second cup is free. Food often includes tofu pies, mushroom pies, different berry filled pies, sandwiches with seitan, cake, cookies, and muffins. Offer a vegan brunch Sundays 11am-2pm.
